titles.title: To amend section 2119 of title 18, United States Code, to strengthen Federal carjacking law.
To amend section 2119 of title 18, United States Code, to strengthen Federal carjacking law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Modifies the Federal carjacking statute to: (1) remove the requirement that the offense be committed with the intent to cause death or serious bodily harm in order for prescribed penalties, other than the death sentence, to apply; and (2) retain the death sentence as an option if the offense is committed with such intent and death results.
